verses.verse: Now Yericho <S%H3405><s%> was straitly <S%H5462><s%> <S%H8802><s%> shut up <S%H5462><s%> <S%H8794><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>: none went out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, and none came in <S%H935><s%> <S%H8802><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%>, See <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, I have given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> into thine hand <S%H3027><s%> Yericho <S%H3405><s%>, and the king <S%H4428><s%> thereof, and the mighty men <S%H1368><s%> of valour <S%H2428><s%>.

And ye shall compass <S%H5437><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%>, all ye men <S%H582><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%>, and go round about <S%H5362><s%> <S%H8687><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> once <S%H6471><s%> <S%H259><s%>. Thus shalt thou do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>.

And seven <S%H7651><s%> Kohanim <S%H3548><s%> shall bear <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> shofars <S%H7782><s%> of rams' shofars <S%H3104><s%>: and the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> ye shall compass <S%H5437><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> times <S%H6471><s%>, and the Kohanim <S%H3548><s%> shall blow <S%H8628><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with the shofars <S%H7782><s%>.

And it shall come to pass, that when they make a long <S%H4900><s%> <S%H8800><s%> blast with the ram's <S%H3104><s%> shofar <S%H7161><s%>, and when ye hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the sound <S%H6963><s%> of the shofar <S%H7782><s%>, all the people <S%H5971><s%> shall shout <S%H7321><s%> <S%H8686><s%> with a great <S%H1419><s%> shout <S%H8643><s%>; and the wall <S%H2346><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> shall fall down <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8804><s%> flat <S%H8478><s%>, and the people <S%H5971><s%> shall ascend up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8804><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> straight before him.

And Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the Kohanim <S%H3548><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them, Take up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8798><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%>, and let seven <S%H7651><s%> Kohanim <S%H3548><s%> bear <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> shofars <S%H7782><s%> of rams' shofars <S%H3104><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the people <S%H5971><s%>, Pass on <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, and compass <S%H5437><s%> <S%H8798><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%>, and let him that is armed <S%H2502><s%> <S%H8803><s%> pass on <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8799><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

And it came to pass, when Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> had spoken <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%> unto the people <S%H5971><s%>, that the seven <S%H7651><s%> Kohanim <S%H3548><s%> bearing <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the seven <S%H7651><s%> shofars <S%H7782><s%> of rams' shofars <S%H3104><s%> passed on <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8804><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and blew <S%H8628><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with the shofars <S%H7782><s%>: and the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> followed <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8802><s%> them <S%H310><s%>.

And the armed <S%H2502><s%> <S%H8803><s%> men went <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8802><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Kohanim <S%H3548><s%> that blew <S%H8628><s%> <S%H8802><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H8628><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with the shofars <S%H7782><s%>, and the rereward <S%H622><s%> <S%H8764><s%> came <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8802><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%>, the Kohanim going on <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, and blowing <S%H8628><s%> <S%H8800><s%> with the shofars <S%H7782><s%>.

And Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Ye shall not shout <S%H7321><s%> <S%H8686><s%>, nor make any noise <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8686><s%> with your voice <S%H6963><s%>, neither shall any word <S%H1697><s%> proceed <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> out of your mouth <S%H6310><s%>, until the day <S%H3117><s%> I bid <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%> you shout <S%H7321><s%> <S%H8685><s%>; then shall ye shout <S%H7321><s%> <S%H8689><s%>.

So the ark <S%H727><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> compassed <S%H5437><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%>, going about <S%H5362><s%> <S%H8687><s%> it once <S%H6471><s%> <S%H259><s%>: and they came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into the camp <S%H4264><s%>, and lodged <S%H3885><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the camp <S%H4264><s%>.

And Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> rose early <S%H7925><s%> <S%H8686><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%>, and the Kohanim <S%H3548><s%> took up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

And seven <S%H7651><s%> Kohanim <S%H3548><s%> bearing <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8802><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> shofars <S%H7782><s%> of rams' shofars <S%H3104><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> went on <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8802><s%> continually <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, and blew <S%H8628><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with the shofars <S%H7782><s%>: and the armed men <S%H2502><s%> <S%H8803><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8802><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them; but the rereward <S%H622><s%> <S%H8764><s%> came <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8802><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, the Kohanim going on <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, and blowing <S%H8628><s%> <S%H8800><s%> with the shofars <S%H7782><s%>.

And the second <S%H8145><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> they compassed <S%H5437><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> once <S%H6471><s%> <S%H259><s%>, and returned <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into the camp <S%H4264><s%>: so they did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>.

And it came to pass on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>, that they rose early <S%H7925><s%> <S%H8686><s%> about the dawning <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8800><s%> of the day <S%H7837><s%>, and compassed <S%H5437><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> after the same manner <S%H4941><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> times <S%H6471><s%>: only on that day <S%H3117><s%> they compassed <S%H5437><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> times <S%H6471><s%>.

And it came to pass at the seventh <S%H7637><s%> time <S%H6471><s%>, when the Kohanim <S%H3548><s%> blew <S%H8628><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with the shofars <S%H7782><s%>, Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the people <S%H5971><s%>, Shout <S%H7321><s%> <S%H8685><s%>; for the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> you the city <S%H5892><s%>.

And the city <S%H5892><s%> shall be accursed <S%H2764><s%>, even it, and all that are therein, to the YY <S%H3068><s%>: only Rachav <S%H7343><s%> the harlot <S%H2181><s%> <S%H8802><s%> shall live <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, she and all that are with her in the house <S%H1004><s%>, because she hid <S%H2244><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the messengers <S%H4397><s%> that we sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

And ye, in any wise <S%H7535><s%> keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8798><s%> yourselves from the accursed thing <S%H2764><s%>, lest ye make yourselves accursed <S%H2763><s%> <S%H8686><s%>, when ye take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> of the accursed thing <S%H2764><s%>, and make <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> a curse <S%H2764><s%>, and trouble <S%H5916><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it.

But all the silver <S%H3701><s%>, and gold <S%H2091><s%>, and vessels <S%H3627><s%> of brass <S%H5178><s%> and iron <S%H1270><s%>, are consecrated <S%H6944><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>: they shall come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into the treasury <S%H214><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

So the people <S%H5971><s%> shouted <S%H7321><s%> <S%H8686><s%> when the Kohanim blew <S%H8628><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with the shofars <S%H7782><s%>: and it came to pass, when the people <S%H5971><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the sound <S%H6963><s%> of the shofar <S%H7782><s%>, and the people <S%H5971><s%> shouted <S%H7321><s%> <S%H8686><s%> with a great <S%H1419><s%> shout <S%H8643><s%>, that the wall <S%H2346><s%> fell down flat <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, so that the people <S%H5971><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into the city <S%H5892><s%>, every man <S%H376><s%> straight before him, and they took <S%H3920><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%>.

And they utterly destroyed <S%H2763><s%> <S%H8686><s%> all that was in the city <S%H5892><s%>, both man <S%H376><s%> and woman <S%H802><s%>, young <S%H5288><s%> and old <S%H2205><s%>, and ox <S%H7794><s%>, and sheep <S%H7716><s%>, and ass <S%H2543><s%>, with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%>.

But Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> had said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto the two <S%H8147><s%> men <S%H582><s%> that had spied out <S%H7270><s%> <S%H8764><s%> the country <S%H776><s%>, Go <S%H935><s%> <S%H8798><s%> into the harlot's <S%H2181><s%> <S%H8802><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>, and bring out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8685><s%> thence the woman <S%H802><s%>, and all that she hath, as ye sware <S%H7650><s%> <S%H8738><s%> unto her.

And the young men <S%H5288><s%> that were spies <S%H7270><s%> <S%H8764><s%> went in <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and brought out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8686><s%> Rachav <S%H7343><s%>, and her father <S%H1><s%>, and her mother <S%H517><s%>, and her brethren <S%H251><s%>, and all that she had; and they brought out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8689><s%> all her kindred <S%H4940><s%>, and left <S%H3240><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them without <S%H2351><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

And they burnt <S%H8313><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>, and all that was therein: only the silver <S%H3701><s%>, and the gold <S%H2091><s%>, and the vessels <S%H3627><s%> of brass <S%H5178><s%> and of iron <S%H1270><s%>, they put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> into the treasury <S%H214><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

And Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> saved <S%H2421><s%> Rachav <S%H7343><s%> the harlot <S%H2181><s%> <S%H8802><s%> alive <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8689><s%>, and her father's <S%H1><s%> household <S%H1004><s%>, and all that she had; and she dwelleth <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in <S%H7130><s%> Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> even unto this day <S%H3117><s%>; because she hid <S%H2244><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the messengers <S%H4397><s%>, which Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to spy out <S%H7270><s%> <S%H8763><s%> Yericho <S%H3405><s%>.

And Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> adjured <S%H7650><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them at that time <S%H6256><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Cursed <S%H779><s%> <S%H8803><s%> be the man <S%H376><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, that riseht up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and buildeth <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8804><s%> this city <S%H5892><s%> Yericho <S%H3405><s%>: he shall lay the foundation <S%H3245><s%> <S%H8762><s%> thereof in his firstborn <S%H1060><s%>, and in his youngest <S%H6810><s%> son shall he set up <S%H5324><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the gates <S%H1817><s%> of it.
So the YY <S%H3068><s%> was with Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%>; and his fame <S%H8089><s%> was noised throughout all the country <S%H776><s%>.
